name: Downlink Frequency-Selective Scheduling
summary: Frequency-Selective Scheduling feature enables the allocation of spectrum parts to a user.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.dlInterferenceManagementActive
parameters.description: Specifies if the downlink interference management is enabled or                                 disabled.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.dlInterferenceManagementActive
parameters.description: Specifies if the downlink interference management is enabled or                                 disabled.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.dlConfigurableFrequencyStart
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the start frequency offset for resources                                 allocation when the downlink interference management is disabled.                                 The parameter is indicated as a percentage of the configured                                 bandwidth,

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.dlConfigurableFrequencyStart
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the start frequency offset for resources                                 allocation when the downlink interference management is disabled.                                 The parameter is indicated as a percentage of the configured                                 bandwidth,

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_CELL_CQI_SUBBAND
parameters.description: Event and event parameters to provide the data to obtain the                                     average CQI value of each sub-band reported by UEs in the cell                                     within the measurement period.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UETR_RADIO_CELL_CQI_SUBBAND
parameters.description: Event and event parameters to provide the data to obtain the                                     average CQI value of each sub-band reported by UEs in the cell                                     within the measurement period.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_CELL_CQI_SUBBAND
events.description: Event and event parameters to provide the data to obtain the                                     average CQI value of each sub-band reported by UEs in the cell                                     within the measurement period.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UETR_RADIO_CELL_CQI_SUBBAND
events.description: Event and event parameters to provide the data to obtain the                                     average CQI value of each sub-band reported by UEs in the cell                                     within the measurement period.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011255 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011255 MO instance.
